comment.p: Note: Not all of these games are emulated yet

revision.comment: No change required for MAME v0.109.
Updated to match MAME v0.108.
Updated to match MAME v0.107.
Updated to match MAME v0.106.
Updated to match MAME v0.105.
No change required for MAME v0.104.
Updated to match MAME v0.103.
No change required for MAME v0.102.
No change required for MAME v0.101.
Updated to match MAME v0.100 (renamed ddsomr1->ddsomr2 and mshvsf->mshvsfu, added ddsomr1+mshvsf).
Updated to match MAME v0.99 (XORs for xmvsfu and new clone... sfza).
Choko CRC and SHA1 information removed to match MAME v0.98.
No change required for MAME v0.98.
Updated to match MAME v0.97 (added avsph+ddtodr1+gwinga+sfz3a+xmvsfar1, renamed sfz3a to sfz3ar1, changed choko+ddtod+xmvsfa).
No change required for MAME v0.96.
No change required for MAME v0.95.
Updated to match MAME v0.93 (added sfz2h and sfzbr1, renamed puzloop2 to pzloop2j, changed choko).
Updated to match MAME v0.92 (added 19xxa and avspa, lots of ROM renames).
Updated supplements for MAME v0.91.
Added new SIMM dumps for puzloop2. Added choko, hsf2a, hsf2j and jgokushi.
Updated supplements for MAME v0.90.

Added pgear and pgeara. Updated pgearj.
Removed hoarded ROMs (jgokushi, choko and hsf2a).
Updated to match MAME v0.89.
No change required for MAME v0.88.
Updated to match MAME v0.87.
No change required for MAME v0.86.

Renamed cybots->cybotsu and sfar2->sfar3.
Added cybots, mvscb, sfa3b, sfar2 and sfz2n.
Removed datafile for sound ROMs and updated supplements for MAME v0.85.
Added SHA1 information.
No change required for MAME v0.83.
No change required for MAME v0.82.
Updated for MAME v0.81.

Renamed armwar->armwarr1 and added new armwar.
Changed sound ROM (rcm.58) in rockmanj.
Added SIMs to progearj.
Now matches MAME v0.79.
No change required for MAME v0.77.

Renamed msh->mshu, xmvsfu->xmvsfur1.
Added ecofghta, msh, mshvsfb1, xmvsfu.
CRC change in 19xxj.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.75.
No change required for MAME v0.74.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.73.

Renamed ddsom->ddsomr1, progear->progearj, xmvsfj->xmvsfjr1, xmvsfjr1->xmvsfjr2.
Added csclub, ddsom, mshvsfb, sfz2b, sfz2br1, xmvsfj.
Added XORs for 19xxjr1, ddsom, csclub.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.71.

Renamed ssf2tu->ssf2tur1, vhunt2->vhunt2r1.
Renames in sfz2ah and ddsomj XORs added.
sfz2ab, ssf2u, vhunt2 and xmvsfb added.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.70.

Added seven new clones (19xxa, csclubh, megamn2a, mshb, mshvsfj2, nwarrb and sfzb).
Added XORs for ddsoma and sfar1, renamed a ROM in mshh.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.68.
Renamed ssf2->ssf2u, added new ssf2 (with XORs). Added XORs for mpangj. A few SIMM changes.
No update required, supplements are fine for MAME v0.67.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.66.
Added XORs for 1944.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.65.
Added XORs for mmatrix and mmatrixj. Also updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.64.
Updated supplementary dats for MAME v0.63.

Added batcir.
Added XORs for batcir, dimahoo and gmahou.
Added additional ROMs to 1944 and 1944j.

Renamed mshvsf->mshvsfu1. Added gigawing, megaman2, mshvsf, xmcotaa, 1944.
Added XORs for ddsomu, vhunt2, mshvsf, megaman2, sfz2aa, xmcotaa, cybots, gigawing, gwingj.
Added QSound ROMs for jgokushi, progear, puzloop2.

Added sfz2aa.
Added XORs for ddtodh, nwarr, vhuntj, vhuntjr1. Parents swapped for cscluba/j and batcira/j.

Added jgokushi and xmvsfjr1.
Added XORs for spf2t, sgemf, sgemfa, pfghtj, ssf2a, ssf2ar1.

Renamed ddsomu->ddsomur1, sfar1->sfar2, ssf2a->ssf2ar1.
Added choko, cybots (parent for cybotsj), ddsomu, ddtodh, mmatrix (parent for mmatrixj), sfar1, ssf2a.

Renamed dstlk->dstlku, dstlkr1->dstlkur1. Added dstlk.
Added XORs for mvsc, mvsca, mvscj, mvscjr1.

Renamed vsav->vsavu.
Added msha, progear, sfz2a, sgemfa, vsav.
Added XORs for dstlka, msha, rckman2j, sfz2a, vsav.

Renamed vampa->dstlka and xmcota->xmcotau.
Added mpangj, nwarrh and xmcota.
Added XORs for ddtod, sfz3a, vsav2, vsava, xmvsf and xmcota.

Added ROM details for armwar, ddtod, mvsca, rckmanj, sfz3a, vsava and xmvsf.
Added XORs for armwar, mshvsf, mshvsfj, mshvsfj1 and vsav.
Added sound ROM dats.
Added XOR details for ddsom, dstlk, dstlkr1, sfa and sfar1. Seven new clones were added in total.
Added XOR details for batcirj, ecofghtr, sfa3, sfa3r1, sfz3j and vampjr1. Also added xmcotah and did some renaming in xmcota.
Added XOR details for smbomb, smbombr1, mshj. Also added 19xxjr1, ddsomjr1, mshvsfh, ssftbj, vampjr1 and did some renaming.
Added XOR details for csclubj, cscluba and ssf2tb. Also added Hispanic games vsavh and xmvsfh.
Added XOR details for sfz2a and added avsp (Euro).

Added XOR details for Armored Warriors and added two new sets (mshvsfa1 and sfz2ah).
Some renaming in mshvsf clones too.
Added XOR details for Street Fighter Zero 2.
Added XOR details for X-Men (rent version) plus new dumps of mshvsf and sfa3.
Added XOR details for Super Street Fighter 2 X and Street Fighter Zero 3 as well as adding Capcom Sports Club dumps.
Added XOR details for Super Puzzle Fighter 2 X, added another four games and did some ROM renames.
Added XOR details for D&D: Shadow over Mystara (US).
Added XOR details for D&D: Tower of Doom (Japan) and added four new games (dimahoo, gmahou, gwingj, mmatrixj).
Added XOR details for Powered Gear (Japan).
Added XOR details for Marvel Super Heroes (Hispanic).
Added XOR details for 19XX (Hispanic).
Added XOR details for Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara (Japan).
Added XOR details for Street Fighter Zero (Japan 950605).
Added XOR details for X-Men Vs Street Fighter.
Added XOR details for the Japanese versions of Super Street Fighter 2.
Changed some CRCs for cybotsj (been redumped by Team Japump).
Added XOR files for cybotsj.
Added XOR files for avspj and a couple of renames in xmvsf.
Added XOR files for 19xx and ROM details for Alien vs Predator (Japan).
Added XOR files for Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo USA.
Added XOR files for Quiz Nanairo Dreams.
Added XOR files for Ring of Destruction: Slammasters II.
Added XOR files for X-Men (USA) plus a couple of renames and redumps.
Added XOR files for Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo and a few ROM redumps.
MAME v0.37b12 plus additional info from CPS2Shock.
Fixed bad ROM in Alien Vs Predator.
Added decrypt fies for Super Street Fighter 2 (USA).
Added a couple more games.
Added decrypt files for ddtod and ddtodr1.
Added decrypt files for xmcotaj.
Some name changes (related to MAME).
Two new clones and some reorganisation.
Second update: Added decode files for vsavj.
sfar1 changed to sfaer1 (confirmed as Euro version). Program XOR masks added into dats.
A couple of ROM renames in Street Fighter Alpha/Zero.
Added 'pgear' and 'ddtoj'.
Added 19XX: The War Against Destiny (Japan 951207).

Another release... fixed an incorrect CRC in sfa3
Previously: Somehow Street Fighter Zero Changer got into the dat (so there are really only five new games).
Uploaded a new dat with sfzch removed (only difference to the one a few hours ago).

Released new dat to go with the latest MAME driver information (six new games added).
This also incorporates details from Naz's FAQ (v2.10).
Corrected CRC of xmnj.06 in X-men (Jap 941219).

Released version 20000831 of the CPS-2 dats.
This update adds information that will be in the next FAQ and also matches the latest MAME submission.
Released v2.00m2 of the dats (fixes some mistypes in the FAQ).
Released v2.00m of the dats (version number corresponds to Naz's FAQ).

Released v1.82a of the dats (version number corresponds to Naz's FAQ).
These dats are consistent with Naz's FAQ and the information at CPS2Shock.
Thanks to Dr. Zero for his contribution.
There were other CPS-2 dats before this but now CPS2Shock, ClrMamePro and RomCenter all match. :)
